Reference:
Hein AS, Marrero SM, Woodward J, Dunning SA, Winter K, Westoby MJ, Freeman SPHT, Shanks RP, Sugden DE, 2016a. Mid-Holocene pulse of thinning in the Weddell Sea sector of the West Antarctic ice sheet. Nature Communications 7, 12511.

Data comments:
Sampling year based on sample names.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology. 24 samples grouped with Bentley et al. (2010) samples.

expage.github.io - data from expage-201712
